description: If you’re one of those people who think there can only be one “song of the summer,” and that the Hot 100 provides a clear-cut metric for determining a winner, then this year’s race is a statistical dead heat.
title: The ‘song of the summer’ sweepstakes are a tie, at least for now

description: Lynch, a tech entrepreneur, had recently been acquitted on federal fraud charges in the U.S. The yacht he was on, the Bayesian, sank two days after Lynch's co-defendant was killed by a car.
title: Who are Mike Lynch and the other people missing after a yacht sank in Sicily?

description: The remarks mark a turn of fortunes for Democrats who were confronted with a lack of voter enthusiasm and flagging poll numbers when President Biden was at the top of the ticket.
title: Schumer says Harris ticket boosts prospects for Democratic candidates

description: "If I have to define my music in any way," Nick Cave says, "it's religious music." His new album is a gallery of encounters with spiritual, possibly divine figures, not all of whom are benevolent.
title: Nick Cave wrestles with a ‘Wild God’

description: "We fight our political battles in stadiums," historian Frank Andre Guridy says. "They become ideal places to stake your claims on what you want the United States to be." His new book is The Stadium.
title: With the DNC underway, a historian explains how 'The Stadium' became a public square

description: Some 524 people, including the ship’s captain, perished when the HMS Hawke went down in the North Sea off the eastern coast of Scotland in 1914.
title: Explorers say they’ve found a British warship sunk by a German U-boat in WWI

description: The planned spacewalk -- a first for a private mission -- will rely on simply opening the spacecraft’s hatch.
title: Civilian Polaris Dawn spacewalk mission is set to make history next week

description: The packages, which were discovered along two beaches in Florida, are reported to have weighed over 100 pounds in total with an estimated street value of over $1 million, authorities said.
title: Hurricane Debby washed ashore $1 million worth of cocaine onto Florida beaches

description: For purveyors of an artform that’s famously permanent, tattoo artists sure like to switch things up. From independent collectives to the “stick and poke” tattoo, a new generation is leaving its mark.
title: 'It's totally different': Younger tattoo artists are ditching the machine

description: Vietnamese new leader's pragmatic approach to ideology and diplomacy may see Vietnam become more confident in pursuing its national interests. But preserving the anti-corruption campaign is paramount.
title: 'No stone unturned': Vietnam's new party boss extends his anti-corruption campaign

description: Rescue teams were returning to the site of a sunken yacht off Sicily on Tuesday to search for six people, including British tech magnate Mike Lynch, who are believed to be still trapped in the hull.
title: Search resumes for British tech magnate and 5 others after yacht sinks off Sicily
